// Global Quiz Interactions for The Cosmic Counselor
console.log('Loading global quiz interactions...');

// Toggle answers functionality
function toggleAnswers() {
  console.log('toggleAnswers called');
  
  const answersContent = document.querySelector('.answers-content');
  const button = document.querySelector('.show-answers-btn');
  
  if (!answersContent || !button) {
    console.warn('Show answers elements not found');
    return;
  }
  
  if (answersContent.style.display === 'none' || !answersContent.style.display) {
    answersContent.style.display = 'block';
    button.textContent = 'Hide Answers';
    button.style.background = '#e74c3c';
  } else {
    answersContent.style.display = 'none';
    button.textContent = 'Show Answers';
    button.style.background = '#3498db';
  }
}

// Assessment box click interactions
function initializeAssessmentInteractions() {
  console.log('Initializing assessment interactions');
  
  const assessmentParagraphs = document.querySelectorAll('.assessment-box p:not(:has(strong)):not(.rating-scale):not(.no-rating):not(:has(em))');
  
  console.log('Found assessment paragraphs:', assessmentParagraphs.length);
  
  for (const p of assessmentParagraphs) {
    p.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
      console.log('Assessment paragraph clicked');
      
      // Remove previous selections in this assessment box
      const parentBox = this.closest('.assessment-box');
      if (parentBox) {
        const allItems = parentBox.querySelectorAll('p:not(:has(strong)):not(.rating-scale):not(.no-rating):not(:has(em))');
        
        for (const item of allItems) {
          item.classList.remove('selected');
          item.style.backgroundColor = '';
          item.style.borderLeft = '';
          item.style.borderRadius = '';
          item.style.padding = '';
        }
      }
      
      // Add selection to clicked item
      this.classList.add('selected');
      this.style.backgroundColor = '#e8f5e8';
      this.style.borderLeft = '4px solid #27ae60';
      this.style.borderRadius = '4px';
      this.style.padding = '0.5rem';
    });
  }
}

// Robust initialization for Quarto books
function initializeQuizInteractions() {
  console.log('Initializing all quiz interactions');
  
  // Use setTimeout to ensure DOM is fully rendered
  setTimeout(() => {
    initializeAssessmentInteractions();
  }, 100);
}

// Multiple initialization strategies
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initializeQuizInteractions);
window.addEventListener('load', initializeQuizInteractions);

// Quarto-specific initialization
if (window.Quarto) {
  window.Quarto.on('ready', initializeQuizInteractions);
}

// Re-initialize when navigating between pages in Quarto books
document.addEventListener('quarto-navigate', initializeQuizInteractions);

// Make functions globally available
window.toggleAnswers = toggleAnswers;
window.initializeQuizInteractions = initializeQuizInteractions;

console.log('Global quiz interactions loaded successfully');
</script>
